text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Fund" means the Neighborhood Housing Services Fund.
"Neighborhood corporation" means a neighborhood housing services corporation established in connection with the Neighborhood Reinvestment Corporation.

section.section:
"Operating budget" means the money necessary to operate a neighborhood corporation, including money to pay:
administrative, technical, legal, or other expenses; and
expenses incurred by an umbrella corporation in operating programs.
"Operating budget" does not include money allocated to revolving or other loan funds.

text.section: "Program" means a program that a neighborhood corporation establishes and supervises to achieve its goals and to provide services within a specific neighborhood.
"Umbrella corporation" means a neighborhood corporation that establishes and supervises at least two programs.
